name: Spirited Away
description: A ten-year-old girl moving to a new neighborhood, enters the world of Kami.

name: Howl's Moving Castle
description: A fictional kingdom against the backdrop of a war with another kingdom

name: Cowboy Bebop: Movie
description: The bounty hunter crew work to find a terrorist planning to destroy the human population on Mars.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
description: In the sequel of Top Gun, Maverick returns to TOP GUN to train a group of elite graduates.

name: Casino Royale (2006)
description: Bond is working to bankrupt the Le Chiffre in a high-stakes poker game at the Casino Royale.

name: The Dark Night
description: The Batman is two years into his role as Gotham's embodiment of vengeance.

name: Spider-man: No Way Home
description: Peter turns to Doctor Strange to make the world forget that he is Spider-Man.

name: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
description: Ethan Hunt and his team seek to prevent nuclear weapon technology from reaching the Apostles.

name: Pride & Prejudice (2005)
description: The film features five sisters who deal with issues of marriage, morality and misconceptions.

name: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the Titanic.

name: Crazy Rich Asians
description: A Chinese-American professor who discovers her boyfriend's family are among the richest in Singapore.

name: The Notebook
description: A poor  man falls in love with a rich woman, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.
